title: BlueLine Named One of Consulting Magazine's "Best Small Firms to Work For"
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 6:44 AM   BlueLine Associates 
CARY, N.C., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- BlueLine Associates, a leading Business Process Management services provider, was recently ranked by Consulting magazine as one of the publication's Best Small Firms to Work For in 2015. BlueLine was ranked 8(th) out of 15, and was specifically recognized for Work/ Life Balance and Compensation & Benefits. 
"We are honored to have one of the highest employee satisfaction rates in the consulting community," said BlueLine President, Rocky Silvestri. "This award is validation that our team members value the culture at BlueLine as well as all the opportunities, reward and recognition we provide." 
Consulting magazine's Best Firms to Work For rankings are based on survey responses in six categories, each measuring a different aspect of employee satisfaction. Categories include client engagement, firm culture, firm leadership, career development, work/life balance, and compensation and benefits. The rankings are based on an online survey of over 9,000 consultants representing 300 firms. 
"We are thrilled to be ranked on the Best Small Firms to Work For list," said BlueLine Partner, Rob Blanchette. "The most critical aspect of our business is our people, and we greatly value their contributions." 
For more information about the Best Firms to Work For rankings, please visit consultingmagazine.com . 
About BlueLine Established in 2009, BlueLine Associates utilizes its vast experience in business and IT operations to provide Business Process Management services to fundamentally transform people, processes and technology. We partner with our clients to help them succeed through: -- Business process transformation -- Creation of best-in-class data/ information management strategies, systems and organizations -- Implementation and optimization of technology 
We believe in a data-driven approach to problem solving; executed through unparalleled hard work, commitment, and passion for perfection. We differentiate ourselves from our competition by truly partnering with our clients from strategy through implementation and by providing significant value in the form of ROI. 
Earlier this year, BlueLine was spotlighted as Consulting Magazine's "Seven to Watch". For more information, please visit www.blueline-associates.com . Follow BlueLine on Twitter @BlueLineAssoc and LinkedIn .
